introduction: SYNOPSISLed by supernatural power, Jeong-Wu and Ji-Hee encounters on a snowy mountain and fall in love witheach other. Ji-Hee says she knows the way to Jeong-Wu's hometown and in his old house, there are a picture of tiger and a well where she drowned herself. In his family's history, his great-grandmother, a young widow, drowned herself because of illicit love. She reincarnated upon Ji-Hee's soul. Suffering from this, Ji-Hee goes to Paradise Temple and Jeong-Wu finds her out there. At last, they reach the summit for a wedding. They disappear like a paradise bird, embracing each other in a heavy snowfall.故事宇智喜烧了身体和心灵在第一次会议很快就似乎被爱情的火焰，一些神秘的灵感冬季山为首的信息。智喜说，老虎滚动和以及他的昂贵认得路克里斯的家。吉熙倒在井里跌倒。说句房子和胡夫人的曾祖母的历史cheongsang这件事出名的好消亡，这是他的曾祖母是转世成智喜。智熙徘徊，去天堂，荣佑发现它，最后到达顶部举行婚礼。在里面，两人像一只长着鹦鹉的长尾鹦鹉在一场热烈的拥抱中消失。
